1983_1: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.
1983_10: Five years later, Tony Manero's Saturday Night Fever is still burning. Now he's strutting toward his biggest challenge yet: succeeding as a dancer on the Broadway stage.
1983_100: Personal assistant Norman struggles to get deteriorating veteran actor Sir through a difficult performance of King Lear.
1983_101: On a desert planet, warlord Jared-Syn is trying to convince a tribe of mutants that he's their messiah and gain unlimited power hidden in a crystal. Ranger Dogen and explorer Dhyana, who's father was murdered by Syn, must stop him.
1983_102: After his wife and son are brutalized by thugs and a corrupt criminal justice system puts the perpetrators back on the street, a New York City factory worker turns vigilante to find some measure of bloody justice.
1983_103: A television newswoman picks up the story of a 1960s rock band whose long-lost leader - Eddie Wilson - may still be alive, while searching for the missing tapes of the band's never-released album.
1983_104: Ensuing after the events of Clouseau's disappearance, his bosses at the Surete put a computer into service to elect a new shrewd detective, Sleigh, who turns up just as inept as Clouseau.
1983_105: Convinced that her father's death was not accidental, a beautiful girl decides to investigate to find out the truth, aided by her boyfriend. Her sleuthing draws her to a local mortuary, where many secrets will be revealed.
1983_106: An aspiring mystery writer becomes accidently embroiled in an international plot during a two-week stay in Malta.
1983_107: After serving two decades in prison, Yellowbeard (Graham Chapman) breaks out determined to recover the treasure that he buried so long ago, alongside his son, old crew, and the British Navy.
1983_108: Nazis are forced to turn to a Jewish historian for help in battling the ancient demon they have inadvertently freed from its prison.
1983_109: When a top local businessman and his two bumbling nephews try to shut down the town's only video arcade, arcade employees and patrons fight back.
1983_11: After he's laid off, a husband switches roles with his wife. She returns to the workforce, and he becomes a stay-at-home dad, a job he has no clue how to do.
1983_110: The Rolling Stones' shows in Tempe, Arizona and East Rutherford, New Jersey during their 1981 US tour.
1983_111: Violetta meets Alfredo and quickly falls for him. After the lovers run away together, they live in bliss for a short time. After the lovers run away together, they live in bliss for a short time. However, Alfredo's father, Giorgio, starts to interfere, concerned that Violetta's bad reputation will affect the marriage prospects of Alfredo's sister. Violetta reluctantly leaves Alfredo, but his love is so strong that it leads him to actions that have tragic consequences.  Written by Toby PadillaSee less
1983_112: In medieval France, some villagers challenge a man's claim of identity when he (as he says) returns home from some time in the army.
1983_113: The story of Billy Mills, the American Indian that came from obscurity, to win the 10,000 meter long distance foot race in the Tokyo Olympics.
1983_114: A warrior seeks his true origins in a seemingly prehistoric wasteland.
1983_115: It's suspected that a peace/anti-nuke organization in UK has some extremists willing to use terrorism. The action will probably be against an embassy in London. The SAS/Special Air Service try to get the organization infiltrated.
1983_116: Five friends travel to a cabin in the woods, where they unknowingly release flesh-possessing demons.
1983_117: Rupert Pupkin is a passionate yet unsuccessful comic who craves nothing more than to be in the spotlight and to achieve this, he stalks and kidnaps his idol to take the spotlight for himself.
1983_119: A State Department employee finds an egg-shaped device with a green fluid inside that makes the person who drinks it invisible. He finds himself being chased by foreign agents who want the substance.
1983_12: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand.

J.P. tries to show his children that he loves them.  Written by Melissa Portell See less
1983_121: An aspiring country/western singer, whose money is disappearing faster than his career opportunities, enters a "Tough Man" amateur boxing contest to earn some cash to pay his bills. 1983_123: During WWII, a British colonel tries to bridge the cultural divides between a British POW and the Japanese camp commander in order to avoid bloodshed.
1983_124: A young artist is commissioned by the wife of a wealthy landowner to make a series of drawings of the estate while her husband is away.
1983_125: In 1944, the residents of a small Italian town under Axis control flee their homes to seek out the liberating Allied forces.
1983_126: A programmer at a TV station that specializes in adult entertainment searches for the producers of a dangerous and bizarre broadcast.

1983_137: A happily married woman comes to realize herself of being a repressed lesbian after she has an affair with a female college professor, and then tries to come to terms with her newfound lifestyle.

1983_139: Set in 1965, four rowdy teenage guys travel to Tijuana, Mexico for a night of partying when they are joined by a heartbroken housewife who is in town seeking a quick divorce.
1983_14: Synthetic kryptonite laced with tar splits Superman in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.
1983_140: Hoping to achieve success in Hollywood, a young aspiring screenwriter allows others to exploit her. She goes through affair after sordid affair in her attempt to write her own screenplay and have it produced.
1983_141: A woman starts exhibiting increasingly disturbing behavior after asking her husband for a divorce. Suspicions of infidelity soon give way to something much more sinister.
1983_142: Documentary about the American gospel music scene, focusing on two of the movement's pioneering forces, Thomas A. Dorsey and Willie May Ford Smith.
1983_143: A man becomes destructively obsessed with killing a dangerous rat, which has taken residence in his, recently renovated, house.
1983_144: An ordinary sex-starved teenager and his friends start secretly video recording high school girls and their activity irks the community, as well as their principal.
1983_145: After winning the ultimate title and being the world champion, Rocky falls into a hole and finds himself picked up by a former enemy.
1983_146: The retelling of an incident in Gonzales, Texas in 1901 revolving around a stolen horse, mistaken identity and a killing. An unusual story of the all too usual exploitation of the powerless in Texas History.
1983_147: In this offbeat comedy, an unlikely romance develops between a flamboyant, middle-aged piano tuner and an extremely timid office worker. In HD.
1983_148: At the end of the ice age, an evil queen and her son are set on conquering the world using magic and warriors. The lone survivor of a crushed village fights back as does the king of Fire Keep.
1983_149: After a young man leaves a band of pirates, hilarity ensues.
1983_15: A group of seven former college friends gather for a week-end reunion at a South Carolina vacation home after the funeral of another of their college friends.
1983_150: Daniel Isaacson attempts to determine the true complicity of his parents Paul and Rochelle Isaacson, who were executed for espionage in the 1950s.
1983_151: A family's home is haunted by a host of demonic ghosts.
1983_152: Four young soldiers waiting to be shipped to Vietnam deal with racial tension and their own intolerance when one soldier reveals he's gay.
1983_153: Britannia Hospital is not preparing for a visit from Queen Elizabeth I, who died in 1603. The visitor is a fictional representation of Queen Elizabeth the Queen Mother.
1983_154: This film tells the story about a group of girls at an exclusive German girls boarding school. Across the lake is an exclusive boys boarding school... Written by Anonymous

1983_156: The mating rituals of two teenage surf chicks from the southern suburbs of Sydney.

1983_158: A malevolent rock star kidnaps a singer to force her to participate in the summoning of a demon, and her band must help her stop him.
1983_16: A S.P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent has stolen two American nuclear warheads, and James Bond must find their targets before they are detonated.
1983_17: The cop test pilot for an experimental police helicopter learns the sinister implications of the new vehicle.
1983_18: A Jewish girl disguises herself as a boy to enter religious training.
1983_19: A worker at a plutonium processing plant is purposefully contaminated, psychologically tortured and possibly murdered to prevent her from exposing worker safety violations at the plant.
1983_2: Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love, and her daughter's family problems.
1983_20: After twenty-two years of psychiatric care, Norman Bates attempts to return to a life of solitude, but the specters of his crimes - and his mother - continue to haunt him.
1983_21: The naughty high schoolers of Angel Beach High now seek revenge on a group of KKK religious fanatics and corrupt politicians who want to shut down their Shakespeare production after they cast a Seminole transfer student in the lead.
1983_22: Ten years after his son went M.I.A. in Vietnam, U.S. Marine retired Colonel Jason Rhodes assembles a private rescue team to find Americans held in P.O.W. camps in Laos.
1983_23: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.
1983_24: A government researcher, sent to research the "menace" of wolves in the north, learns about the true beneficial and positive nature of the species.
1983_25: Four horror and science fiction segments, directed by four famous directors, each of them being a new version of a classic story from Rod Serling's landmark television series.
1983_26: To inherit his mother-in-law's colossal fortune, a hard-living gambling addict must change his unhealthy ways before they get the best of him.
1983_27: During WW1, an alcoholic American biplane pilot is hired by the spoiled daughter of an industrialist to find her father who disappeared in Asia.
1983_28: The rivalry between two gangs, the poor Greasers and the rich Socs, only heats up when one gang member kills a member of the other.
1983_29: Two sets of two college guys spend a spring break together in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. There they have lots of fun in and out of the sun.
1983_3: A Pittsburgh woman with two jobs as a welder and an exotic dancer wants to get into ballet school.
1983_30: When God decides to destroy Earth, four angels aim to redeem mankind through a young man and woman with their own troubles.
1983_31: A rich father hires a tutor for his son. The son is a horny teenager and the tutor is a gorgeous blonde. Complications ensue.
1983_32: A young man in private school spends one crazy night out, but soon realizes the woman he hooked up with is not who he expected.
1983_33: The story of the original Mercury 7 astronauts and their macho, seat-of-the-pants approach to the space program.
1983_34: Cujo, a friendly St. Bernard, contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.
1983_35: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.
1983_36: Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.
1983_37: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability.
1983_38: When Jesse Lujack steals a car in Las Vegas and drives down to LA, his criminal ways only escalate- but when will it end?
1983_39: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie attempts to convince his parents, his teacher and Santa that a Red Ryder BB gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.
1983_4: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.
1983_40: An English teacher and struggling single mother has her life disrupted when the father who abandoned her as a child comes back into her life.
1983_41: Julie, a girl from the valley, meets Randy, a punk from the city. They are from different worlds and find love. Somehow they need to stay together in spite of her trendy, shallow friends.
1983_42: An ambitious young football star is trapped in a dying mill town--unless his gridiron skills can win him a way out.
1983_43: A prince and a fellowship of companions set out to rescue his bride from a fortress of alien invaders who have arrived on their home planet.
1983_44: On a distant planet inhabited by mutants, two bounty-hunters race to rescue three Earth female captives from the clutches of an evil mutant warlord.
1983_45: Part live stand-up performance, part documentary, this film is one of comedian Richard Pryor's later stand-up performances. As foul-mouthed as ever, Pryor touches on most of the same topics as in his previous live shows. Read more: Synopsis
1983_46: The misadventures of a group of unfortunate but street-wise cabbies working for a Washington, D.C. decrepit taxicab company.
1983_47: A Moscow police officer investigates a vicious triple homicide and stumbles upon a high-level international political conspiracy.
1983_48: Cheech and Chong fly to the marijuana capital of the world, Amsterdan, for a film festival where they take Dolly Parton and Burt Reynold's place in a limo, suite, press conference and performance. They throw in some sketches as well.
1983_49: The comedy team takes a look at life in all of its stages in their own uniquely silly way.
1983_5: A giant thirty-five-foot shark becomes trapped in a SeaWorld theme park and it's up to the sons of police chief Brody to rescue everyone.
1983_50: An alcoholic professor has been hired by a working-class girl for higher education.

1983_53: A woman is tormented and sexually molested by an invisible demon.

1983_58: A teenager loses his horse in Morocco and gets him back after various daredevil adventures.
1983_59: A poor boy named Arthur learns the power of love, kindness, knowledge and bravery with the help of a wizard called Merlin in the path to become one of the most beloved kings in English history.
1983_6: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.
1983_60: The warrior Deathstalker is sent by a witch on a quest to find a chalice, an amulet, and a sword, two of which are held by the wicked sorcerer Munkar.

1983_66: The story of the Greek mythological figure, updated in this 80's version.
